Controller Inheritance

Controllers can be inherited/derived by other controllers, where in the properties of base controller are inherited/derived by child controllers.

Inheritance (base-child controllers)

Controllers can be inherited by other controllers, this allows to have base-child controller relationship. You want to have authorization enabled for few controllers, this is how you do it 


    

    
    
        
  •  Always remember, have an empty route on base controller like this
            @Controller('')
        
    • 
        
  • 
            If you have a route on base controller like this
            @Controller('/base') then all the child controllers have a base route like
            /base/child1/get and
            /base/child2/get
        
    •
